msItem.colophon: 97va: ዝመጽሐፍ፡ የጌው[sic]፡ አቶ፡ ሀጐሥ፡ ዘአጽሐፎ፡ በንዋዩ፡ ዘወሀቦ፡ ለታቦተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ዘመአጐ፡ ከመ፡ ያድኅኖ፡ እመከራ፡ ሥጋ፡ ወነስፍ፡ ለፍቁሩ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያ [97vb] ም፡ ወምስለ፡ ፍቅርቱ፡ ወለተ፡ ሥላሤ፡ ወምስለ፡ ደቂቁ፡... [98rb] ...ተጽሕፈ፡ በዘመነ፡ ሉቃስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ በዘመነ፡ መስፍንነ፡ ራስ፡ መንገሻ፡ ወገበዙ፡ መም[ሕ]ሬ፡ አብርሃ። በ፲፻በ፭፻ኮነ፡ ዓመተ፡ ዓለም። በ፲፻ወ፰፻ኮነ፡ ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ የተጻፈበት፡ ወርቁ። ፮፡ የወንጌል፡ ፭ገበታ፡ የድ[ርሳነ]፡ ሚካኤል፡ ፰ብር፡ ፻ገበታ።97va: This is the book of geta(?) ʾato Hagʷäs who caused it to be written with his money and who donated it to the tabot of St George of Mäʾagʷä so that He might save his beloved Gabra Māryām [97vb] from the tribulations of the flesh and soul, together with his beloved Walatta Śǝllāse and with his children. ... [98rb] ... It was written in the year of Luke the Evangelist, during the time of our governor rās Mängäša (Yoḥannǝs) and qes gabaz mamḥǝre ʾAbrǝha, in 1500 year of the world, in 1800 year of mercy. The money that the gospel has been written with is 6 (Bǝrr), 5 gäbätä (of grain) and the Homiliary for the feasts of St Michael is 8 Bǝrr, 5 gäbätä (of grain). The colophon is written in smaller script. The years mentioned in the colophon do not correspond with the mentioning of rās Mängäša (s. dating). The last part is written in Amharic.

origin.origDate: According to the colophon, the Ms. was written during the time of rās Mängäša Yoḥannǝs, governor of Tǝgray between 1889 and 1906 (as Ms. MMA-009). Mämḥǝre ʾAbrǝha was qes gabaz of the church.

history.provenance: According to the colophon, the Ms. was commissioned and donated by ʾato Hagʷäs (the same as Ms. MMA-009). His baptismal name, Gabra Māryām, and the names of his family members are written in the supplication formulas throughout the Ms.
